net.pocorall.automaton

Class RunAutomaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pocorall.automaton.RunAutomaton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Automaton

    public class RunAutomaton
extends Object
implements Serializable, Automaton
    Finite-state automaton with fast run operation.
    Author:
    Anders Møller <amoeller@cs.au.dk>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RunAutomaton

        public RunAutomaton(DefaultAutomaton a)
        Constructs a new RunAutomaton from a deterministic DefaultAutomaton. Same as RunAutomaton(a, true).
        Parameters:
        a - an automaton

      • RunAutomaton

        public RunAutomaton(DefaultAutomaton a,
            boolean tableize)
        Constructs a new RunAutomaton from a deterministic DefaultAutomaton. If the given automaton is not deterministic, it is determinized first.
        Parameters:
        a - an automaton
        tableize - if true, a transition table is created which makes the run method faster in return of a higher memory usage

      • load

        public static RunAutomaton load(URL url)
                         throws IOException,
                                OptionalDataException,
                                ClassCastException,
                                ClassNotFoundException,
                                InvalidClassException
        Retrieves a serialized RunAutomaton located by a URL.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of serialized automaton
        Throws:
        IOException - if input/output related exception occurs
        OptionalDataException - if the data is not a serialized object
        InvalidClassException - if the class serial number does not match
        ClassCastException - if the data is not a serialized RunAutomaton
        ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object cannot be found

                         throws IOException,

                                ClassCastException,

        Throws:
        IOException - if input/output related exception occurs
        OptionalDataException - if the data is not a serialized object
        InvalidClassException - if the class serial number does not match
        ClassCastException - if the data is not a serialized RunAutomaton
        ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object cannot be found

      • store

        public void store(OutputStream stream)
           throws IOException
        Writes this RunAutomaton to the given stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - output stream for serialized automaton
        Throws:
        IOException - if input/output related exception occurs

      • step

        public int step(int state,
       char c)
        Returns the state obtained by reading the given char from the given state. Returns -1 if not obtaining any such state. (If the original DefaultAutomaton had no dead states, -1 is returned here if and only if a dead state is entered in an equivalent automaton with a total transition function.)

      • run

        public Object run(String s)
        Returns true if the given string is accepted by this automaton.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Automaton

      • run

        public int run(String s,
      int offset)
        Returns the length of the longest accepted run of the given string starting at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        s - the string
        offset - offset into s where the run starts
        Returns:
        length of the longest accepted run, -1 if no run is accepted

        Creates a new automaton matcher for the given input.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A new automaton matcher for the given input
